    • About Lisa Treu


    Lisa Treu knows that creating opportunities is what she loves to do each day. Selling Real estate is more than selling a house, it is someone’s home and each closing is treated with care. In 2014, Treu Group Real Estate was honored to earn the endorsement of Real Estate Mogul and member of Shark Tank, Barbara Corcoran. Additionally, due to our innovative marketing, we were the only local real estate company or agent nominated as the 2014 and 2015 Top Real Estate marketer in North America. Lisa is honored to bring current real estate information each week on WJNO. Lisa is here to help Treu Group Real Estate clients get to the closing table. Lisa understands luxury real estate, marketing, negotiating, and studies the market to help our clients get ahead of changes that are always happening in Palm Beach and Martin County.

    Lisa Treu
    The Treu Group
